summary: A tavern worker and the daughter of a burgomaster enter into elaborate masquerades in order to win the hearts of the men they love.
cast: Marion Davies|Owen Moore|Louise Fazenda|George Siegmann|Karl Dane|Russ Powell|Snitz Edwards|William Orlamond|Ignatz|Jack Hampton|William White|Fred Bloss|John D. Bloss|Roy Bloss|Micky Delano|Kay Deslys|Caroline Dine|Sally Eilers|Fred Gamble|Tommy Hicks|Audrey Howell|Leon Janney|Scotty Mattraw|Bobby Newman|Billy Rodgers|Carl 'Major' Roup|Turner Savage|Albert Schaefer|Maxine Tabnac|Walter Wilkinson
title: The Red Mill
